account.api.deprecated:
As announced on July 11 2018, we are soon releasing v3 of the login API, which will deprecate v2 and v1 as well as the API keys. If you are using v2 or v1 right now, please prepare for changes in the future and switch to v3 as soon as possible.
More info on v3 can be found here.

avitool.headline: AviTool
avitool.what.text:
AviTool is a simple tool that lets you add pre-defined overlays to your social media avatars.

To get the best results, use a 500x500 picture. Any other square picture should do too.

If you use a rectangle image, the tool will automatically try to resize and crop the picture to fit, this might not give the best results.
